description.narrative: As part of a scaled up aid in Africa this initiative supports, an enhanced Maternal and Child Health (MCH) program which aims to contribute to meeting Millennium Development Goals (MDG) 4 and 5 (reduce child mortality and improve maternal health), through new and strengthened partnerships with multilateral agencies, in areas including: improved health workforce training and planning; midwifery and other health personnel training; and niche MCH health issues such as obstetric fistula, access to family planning services (particularly in remote areas) and access to emergency obstetric care. The program has an overall regional focus with bilateral engagement in selected countries. The total value of this initiative over 4 years is $4.2 million, starting 2009-10.
